EXIT   X

DUTIES OF OFFICERS

Page

Table of Contents

 

Victoria

 

There is no explicit due diligence defence in Victoria. If an officer in Victoria follows the above steps, then the courts will look favourably upon the officer when determining his or her guilt.

 

To demonstrate that he or she has exercised appropriate due diligence, an officer will need to show that the PCBU has an effective workplace health and safety system.

 

An effective work health and safety system may include:

 

•

hazard analysis and risk management systems

•

WHS policies and procedures

•

documented internal reporting systems

•

regular WHS audits

•

education and awareness programs for workers

 

An officer must also demonstrate that they:

 

•

have a good understanding of the hazards and risks associated with the operations and the PCBU's approach to managing the hazards and risks

•

directed adequate resources to WHS initiatives

Victoria
